item.title: Enabling keyboard shortcuts for buttons with buttonStyle applied in SwiftUI
item.description: When you try to create a cool UI with SwiftUI, you will often face a problem. In this article, I’ll show you how to use keyboardShortcut to assign keyboard shortcuts to buttons that have been customized with buttonStyle.
